order - package order
 
Order - Class in order
An order is created when a customer places an order with the restaurant.
Order(int, int, int, int, Calendar) - Constructor for class order.Order
This creates an order, as well as the lists of ala carte items and promotion packages
OrderMenuItem - Class in order
This is an extention of menu item, which includes the quantity ordered, as well as its price multiplied by the quantity
OrderMenuItem(int, String, String, double, MenuItem.TYPE_OF_MENU, int) - Constructor for class order.OrderMenuItem
Creates the order menu item line with the quantity ordered
OrderMgr - Class in order
The control class of the order entities Contains the list of orders For information on each order in the list, please visit order
OrderMgr() - Constructor for class order.OrderMgr
When instantiating this manager, it will create a list of orders
OrderPromotionPackage - Class in order
This is an extention of promotion package, which includes the quantity ordered, as well as its price multiplied by the quantity
OrderPromotionPackage(int, String, double, String, ArrayList<MenuItem>, int) - Constructor for class order.OrderPromotionPackage
Creates the promotion package item line with the quantity ordered
OrderUI - Class in order
